text: aur hamaare lie is sansaar mein bhalaee likh de tatha paralok mein bhee, ham teree or laut aaye. us (allaah) ne kahaah main apanee yaatana jise chaahata hoon, deta hoon. aur meree daya pratyek cheez ko samoye hue hai. main use un logon ke lie likh doonga, jo avagya se bachenge, zakaat denge aur jo hamaaree aayaton par eemaan laayenge
